story.text: Steve Callaway appears to be h. sapiens and an AI systems designer. He lives in Plymouth, Devon, England. He studies Norse mythology, Anglo-Saxon English and Cornish language, besides writing for www.wikipedia.org and occasionally doing some serious consultancy work.
He likes the [[Ruby Language]] very much indeed. Unfortunately the [[Java Language]] pays the bills.
